it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends Object
    Definition: A sensor is an instrument that can observe a property or phenomenon with the goal of producing an estimate of the value of the property. In some cases, the sensor in this data model can also be seen as the procedure (method, algorithm, or instrument) defined in OGC 07-022r1.
    Author:
    Dario Bonino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sensor()
      Empty class constructor, respects the bean instantiation pattern
      Sensor(String metadata)
      Builds a new Sensor instance described by the given metadata.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sensor

        public Sensor()
        Empty class constructor, respects the bean instantiation pattern

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(String metadata)
        Builds a new Sensor instance described by the given metadata.
        Parameters:
        metadata - The detailed description of the sensor or system. The content is open to accommodate changes to SensorML or to support other description languages.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadata

        public String getMetadata()
        Provides back the metadata describing this Sensor instance.
        Returns:
        The metadata as a String. It contains the detailed description of the sensor or system. The content is open to accommodate changes to SensorML or to support other description languages.

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(String metadata)
        Sets the metadata describing this Sensor instance.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the metadata to set, it contains the detailed description of the sensor or system. The content is open to accommodate changes to SensorML or to support other description languages.

      • getObservations

        public Set<Observation> getObservations()
        Provides a Live reference to the list of observations generated by this Sensor object. The underlying data structure is not Thread-safe, therefore synchronization and concurrent modification issues might arise in multi-threaded environments.
        Returns:
        the live reference to the inner Set<Observation>.

      • setObservations

        public void setObservations(Set<Observation> observations)
        Updates the Set<Observation> generated by this Sensor. Any previously existing information is discarded.
        Parameters:
        observations - the observations to set.

      • addObservation

        public void addObservation(Observation observation)
        Adds a single Observation to the set of observations generated by this device.
        Parameters:
        observation - The observation to add.

      • removeObservation

        public boolean removeObservation(Observation observation)
        Removes a single Observation from the set of observations generated by this device.
        Parameters:
        observation - The observation to remove.
        Returns:
        true if removal was successful, false otherwise
